title: Gold Wyrmling Staff
content:
Gold Wyrmling Staff Rare 3~13 Damage Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands 1d8 (1d6)+1 Bludgeoning+ 1d4 Fire Weapon Enchantment +1 Fire Bolt Main Hand OnlyTopple The fire engulfing this staff seems to feed off thin air, never once burning the dark wood. Quarterstaff Versatile 1.8 310

Gold Wyrmling Staff

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6)+1 Bludgeoning+ 1d4 Fire

Weapon Enchantment +1

Main Hand OnlyTopple

The fire engulfing this staff seems to feed off thin air, never once burning
